desc: Reusable Face Masks with 95% filtration efficiency with proprietary 5 layer filtration technology (compared to 2%-38% with cloth masks), and 20% of all profits going to the Ocean Cleanup, whose job will be even bigger with the amount of disposable masks & PPE ending up in rivers and oceans.

layout.text: (Up to 45 times better than cotton masks)
25% of Profits to the Ocean Cleanup
